hero.title: About TEKORA.
hero.subtitle: Leader in the import and distribution of high-end SPC flooring in Casablanca, in partnership with PietraNox for excellence in quality.

story.title: TEKORA.
story.content: TEKORA., based in Casablanca, specializes in the import and distribution of high-end SPC (Stone Plastic Composite) flooring. Our products offer aesthetics and comfort comparable to traditional parquet, while being significantly more resistant and durable.
story.content2: Compliant with Italian standards and certified FloorScore, CE, IAF, SGS, ISO9001, ISO14001, our flooring supports 2G and 5G click systems. They guarantee quality, durability, and reliability for all residential and commercial projects.
story.content3: Our flooring is perfectly suited for homes, bathrooms, kitchens, offices, retail stores, hotels, and high-traffic environments. With excellent value for money and a 10-year warranty, we aim to build long-term partnerships with real estate developers, architects, installers, and retailers.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: Key milestones that shaped our success and growth over the years

missionVision.title: Our Commitment
missionVision.subtitle: A clear mission and an ambitious vision for the future of flooring

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide the highest quality SPC flooring solutions, suitable for all spaces and users—individuals, professionals, and real estate developers—while respecting the environment.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become the reference partner for exceptional flooring projects, recognized for our expertise, innovation, and commitment to quality and sustainability.

pietranox.title: PietraNox
pietranox.content: PietraNox is an innovative company based in Casablanca, Morocco, specializing in the production of SPC (Stone Plastic Composite) flooring. Our business model focuses on wholesale distribution to resellers and distributors, as well as exports to strategic markets such as the European Union and the United States, which account for 85% of our revenue.
pietranox.content2: We primarily target construction and renovation companies, as well as distributors and importers seeking durable, aesthetic, and high-performance flooring solutions. Thanks to our technical expertise and quality commitment, PietraNox stands as a trusted partner for large-scale projects.

hero.title: SPC Flooring
hero.subtitle: Discover our exceptional range of high-end SPC flooring, equivalent to parquet in aesthetics and comfort

features.title: Product Features
features.subtitle: Exceptional performance for all your spaces

water.title: Water Resistance
water.longDescription: Our SPC flooring is 100% waterproof, ideal for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. Waterproof technology ensures that moisture and spills do not compromise durability, offering unmatched comfort and peace of mind.

fire.title: Fire Resistance
fire.longDescription: Safety is essential. Our SPC floors are fire-resistant, reducing flammability risks and providing added protection in homes and professional spaces. Compliant with EN 13501-1 (BFL-S1 classification).

stain.title: Stain Resistance
stain.longDescription: Thanks to their stain-resistant surface, these floors remain flawless every day. Food, drink, and household spills do not penetrate the surface, making cleaning easy and keeping the floor looking new.

durability.title: Comfort & Durability
durability.description: 10-year warranty, impact-resistant with 1.5 mm IXPE underlay.
durability.longDescription: Our SPC flooring combines aesthetics and strength: wood, stone, or concrete imitation delivers elegance and modernity while resisting impacts, wear, and heavy traffic. Each floor is designed to last, with a 10-year warranty.

specs.title: Technical Sheet
specs.subtitle: Detailed specifications of our SPC flooring

items.label: Dimensions
items.value: Herringbone 750 x 150 mm and 1220 x 180 mm

pietranox.title: PietraNox
pietranox.subtitle: Premium SPC Production
pietranox.description: PietraNox is an innovative Italian producer specializing in SPC flooring, combining premium quality, technical performance, and contemporary design. Our business model focuses on wholesale distribution and exports to strategic markets, including the European Union and the United States, which represent 85% of our revenue. We serve construction and renovation companies, distributors, and importers seeking durable, aesthetic, and high-performance flooring solutions. Driven by proven technical expertise and a strong commitment to quality, PietraNox stands as a trusted partner for large-scale projects.

cta.title: Need personalized advice?
cta.description: Our team of experts is available to guide you and support your project.

hero.title: Our Certifications
hero.subtitle: Excellence validated by the highest international standards

quality.title: Certified Quality
quality.description: Our certifications demonstrate our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. Every step of our process is strictly controlled to ensure the highest quality standards.

list.name: ISO 9001:2015
list.description: Quality management system certification ensuring optimized processes and continuous improvement.

list.name: ISO 14001:2015
list.description: Environmental certification demonstrating our commitment to environmental protection.

list.name: FloorScore
list.description: Indoor air quality certification (SCS-EC10.3-2014 v4.0) ensuring ultra-low emissions.

list.name: CE Marking
list.description: Compliance with essential European Union requirements.

standards.title: International Standards
standards.subtitle: Compliance with the strictest American and European regulations for your safety

commitment.title: Our Quality Commitment
commitment.description: We are committed to maintaining the highest quality standards in all our operations. Our products are made from 100% virgin raw materials, free from formaldehyde and phthalates, with ultra-low emissions (TVOC A+).
